arts.ttl: Gareth Ainsworth outlines Shrewsbury Town 'fear' after 'criminal' defending in latest defeat
arts.sum: “We've looked susceptible to goals, and then at the other end, we don't seem to believe we're going to score from a set piece. This time, it was Burton Albion who got the better of Ainsworth’s side as they won 2-0 in Shropshire - Town now find themselves 14 points from League One safety with just nine matches left in the campaign.

arts.ttl: Burton enhance survival prospects with victory at bottom-side Shrewsbury
arts.sum: Rumarn Burrell and Terence Vancooten struck for the Brewers.

arts.ttl: Preview: Shrewsbury Town vs. Burton Albion - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Saturday's League One clash between Shrewsbury Town and Burton Albion, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
